title: i was wondering if we will get ip boost for the weekend
body:
Eu in general got some Huge ip boosts for the weekend and i was wondering if we will get any ip boosts on oce
Ty in advance

replies.body: [If we achieve our goals during ocean week, an IP boost is on the cards](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/oceanweek-2017).

> [{quoted}](name=Yaiamone,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=mmgbqNwl,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-01-21T03:24:29.947+0000)
>
> [If we achieve our goals during ocean week, an IP boost is on the cards](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/oceanweek-2017).

When is the ocean week , what exactly happens in that week and what are the Goals of that week

It starts in ~5 days and it is similar to previous ocean weeks in the facet that it has tiered goals and rewards. 

First one to unlock is that all champions become free to play, and that will happen when we defeat one monster.

Last one is usually a biggie, with previous rewards being the nautilus statue and community wall. This year the aim is to make conservationist contribution to Oceanic animals and give back IRL. The specifics will be released during the event. 
IP weekend is fourth on the line of rewards (defeating four monsters) :)

Be sure to enlist and click the link in my original comment! :D
Please tell me we are getting an ip boost riot :D
